name: varianceThreshold
description: I saw that there are a lot of features in your dataset. Variance Threshold algorithm lets you remove the less significant ones in order to remove noise and make the analysis quicker.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.question: Type a decimal value between 0 and 10 that will be the minimum variance for a feature not to be removed for the analysis
parameters.help: !! We could show which features would be removed and which would be kept !!
